title: Eisenhower Little Rock continuation of development

content.question: Which of the following events represented a continuation of the development discussed in the excerpt?

choices.label: The advocacy for the passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964
The opposition of activists to the Plessy v. Ferguson decision
The increasing debates over racial equality by African American military veterans
The Great Migration of African Americans from the rural South to urban areas in the North and West

content.answer: The advocacy for the passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964

topic.text: 8.6: Early Steps in the Civil Rights Movement (1940s and 1950s)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
